channel.title: admin on Huijie's Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Huijie's Home Page

item.description: I’m a data/applied scientist at Microsoft. I obtained my Ph.D in Statistics at Cornell University supervised by Prof. Yang Ning. My interests span widely on statistics and machine learning. Broadly, I have experience in high-dimensional statistical estimation and inference, graphical models, adversarial robustness, computer vision, contextual bandits and offline reinforcement learning. Before my Ph.D, I received dual Bachelor’s degrees from Cornell University and Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I feel fortunate to graduate from Chengdu No.
